item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

case 12334:
itemDef.name = "PacMan Sword";
itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
itemDef.modelID = 12334;
itemDef.modelZoom = 848;
itemDef.modelRotationY = 267;
itemDef.modelRotationX = 136;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = 5;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = 0;
itemDef.anInt165 = -1;
itemDef.anInt200 = -1;
itemDef.anInt188 = -1;
itemDef.description = "WakaWakaWakaWaka".getBytes();
break;

item.title: Models
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Hey guys whenever I add a model to my server and wear it, it looks super wierd, like I made a sword, but it turned out being a rock floating under me?? so how can I fix that? these are my ints.
case 12334:
itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
itemDef.itemActions[1] = “Wear”;
itemDef.modelID = 12333; //drop model
itemDef.anInt165 = 12334; //male wield model
itemDef.anInt200 = 12334; //femArmModel
itemDef.modelZoom = 848;
itemDef.aByte154 = -14;
itemDef.modelRotationY = 267;
itemDef.modelRotationX = 136;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = 5;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = 0;
itemDef.aByte154 = -14;
itemDef.name = “PacMan Sword”;
itemDef.description = “WakaWakaWakaWaka”.getBytes();
break;
